column4: hello i have a little problem, i don't know how to change the password of my normal user, because i forgett it. im now connected with my su-account.
ok that's easy enough to sort out
In the olden Ubuntu days would have to use a Live CD to sort that out,  but  not for the past few or so releases since recovery mode
boot it up from Grub, get the root shell, and passwd username, or use the Live CD
